segments.text: Welcome to Al's Bakery . What can I get you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi ! Let me get a dozen croissants , four blueberry muffins and a loaf of sourdough bread .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Would you like to have the loaf sliced ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that's OK . Do you have any whole wheat bread ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are out at the moment . May I suggest some rye bread ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure that sounds good . Do you have any cakes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have various birthday cakes and also ice cream cakes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your total is forty three dollars and twenty cents .
segments.speaker: S1
